content.rendered:
Transfer the amount to the following Account

Kindly transfer the amount to the following Account and call us on +919677174226 with the reference number.

 

Account Name: OFFICERS IAS ACADEMY

Account No: 1384005500340980

IFSC Code: PUNB0138400

Bank: Punjab National Bank

Branch: Anna Nagar, Chennai-600040
